author: stevel
msg: bug 42277: String resources can have properties double expanded
Nested text is allowed, and property expansion is done at the tail end of a write, not on every read.

author: kelvingoodson
msg: reintroducing tests using base64binary as discussed in TUSCANY-1223 as spec group have discussed the issue and have decided that the issue should be fixed by putting annotations on the property

author: stevel
msg: Bind string resources to projects. There's no bugrep with this, but it is good practise
